ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: TP, LB and BV designed the study; TP and MW collected the data and performed the statistical analyses; FB conducted the matrix population modelling; TP wrote the first draft of the manuscript with subsequent input from all authors. All authors contributed critically to the drafts of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All R scripts have been uploaded to—and are accessible at— https://github.com/falko-buschke/Climate-change-and-demographic-resilience. The datasets used and/or analysed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: We were granted access to the Korannaberg sampling site, which is on private land, by the family Strydom. All sampling was performed under sampling permit HK/P1/07375/002 and samples were exported under permit HK/P1/06901/002, issued by ‘The Free State Province, Department of Tourism, Environmental and Economic Affairs’.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: TP is currently supported by a postdoctoral fellowship of the Research Foundation—Flanders (FWO, 12F0716 N). This research benefited from additional financial support from the Research Foundation—Flanders 3E090007 and 3E110799 and the Excellence Center ‘Eco and socio-evolutionary dynamics’ (PF/10/007) of the KU Leuven Research Fund. The funding agencies did not contribute directly to the design of the study, the collection, analysis and interpretation of the data nor to the writing of the manuscript.
